title: Pensions
context: ยง54-29 Pensions. All officers and employees of the board of water supply shall be entitled to the benefits of part II of chapter 88. The employer&rsquo;s contribution to the retirement fund, as provided thereunder, shall be paid from the funds under the control of the board.
